title: Lease on life
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Preventive health services
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Tuberculosis
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Medicine, Preventive
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Diseases - Prevention
description: The story of an average American family and how they plan to avoid unnecessary illness. Shows the forces of prevention in action, the conflict between superstition and fact, and the effective combination of skilled hands and trained minds in medical teamwork, with special reference to anti-tuberculosis measures.
